price: 60. Hoog waxaa leh kuwa gaalooba, kaasoo ku iman Maalinkoodaasi loogu gooddiyey (Maalinta Qiyaamaha).
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
